name: Rock Tale
description:
you play with a small rock named TALA  looking for her lost sisters, the story took a place in the old mysterious city of SEFAR - TASSILI - ALGERIA .

in order to find the sisters, TALA has to pass many obstacles, protecting her message and facing the Algerian folkloric creature BAZGHOGH (AANZA)

ِCreated for Cultural Heritage Global Game Jam

CREDITS :

Developement, Game Design, art and story solo by : Berri Oussama (samdevstudio)
